comments:
During one of our publish operation we get a datamodel and try to do an export of the EAR to a specific directory, this simulates the export from the UI, so I tried to do an export from the UI, and I noticed that the UI export of an 5.0 ear with no application.xml is also failing. I assume that once we get the UI working, the datamodel export will also work.

This is the exception that I am getting from the UI export.

*** Bug 188710 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Created an attachment (id=68671)
patch

This patch hooks in the new IArchive support for exporting EARs.  This new support does not require the application.xml (likewise, the various modules don't need their dd files for export to work).  This patch also has improve IArchive exception handling and progress monitor support.
Carl tested RC2, and was able to export an Ear 50 with no DD.

causedBy.message: IWAE0006E Archive is not a valid EAR File because the deployment descriptor can not be found (case sensitive): META-INF/application.xml
